message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $80 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is $100 to you, but I'm only willing to pay up to $80 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $80 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95, considering the value of the product for both of us. Let me know if this works for you.
